Package org.whispersystems.libsignal

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DecryptionCallback
    This interface is implemented in SessionCipher to provide a NullDecryptionCallback method.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CurveTest  
    CurveTest  
    IdentityKey
    A class for representing an identity key.
    IdentityKeyPair
    Holder for public and private identity key pair.
    SessionBuilder
    SessionBuilder is responsible for setting up encrypted sessions.
    SessionBuilderTest  
    SessionCipher
    The main entry point for Signal Protocol encrypt/decrypt operations.
    SessionCipherTest  
    SignalProtocolAddress
    In Signal Protocol, this address provides the name of the user and its corresponding deviceID.
    SimultaneousInitiateTests  
    StaleKeyExchangeException  
    TestInMemoryIdentityKeyStore  
    TestInMemorySignalProtocolStore  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DuplicateMessageException
    throws if the input is a message that has already been received.
    InvalidKeyException
    throws when the key is formatted incorrectly
    InvalidKeyIdException
    throws when there is no local PreKeyRecord that corresponds to the PreKey ID in the message
    InvalidMacException  
    InvalidMessageException
    throws if the input is not valid ciphertext
    InvalidVersionException
    throws if the version is invalid.
    LegacyMessageException
    throws if the input is a message formatted by a protocol version that is no longer supported
    NoSessionException
    throws if there is no established session for this contact.
    UntrustedIdentityException
    throws when the IdentityKey of the sender is untrusted
